channel.title: Darksiders
channel.description:
Hey Guys,
Is darksiders any good? It´s on steam´s deal of the day for 5€

item.title: Darksiders
item.dc:creator: loony636
item.description:
I would avoid it like the plague. Watch the Zero Punctuation review of it, and stick to some of the better hack’n’slash-ers like God of War.

I got it on the Christmas Steam Sales (I think?) and it honestly looks and plays like ass.

Read full topic

item.title: Darksiders
item.dc:creator: Shadi
item.description:
yup I played it on PC, and it’s quite good, never had any real trouble with mouse & keyboard

Read full topic

item.title: Darksiders
item.dc:creator: Conlaen
item.description:
I liked it. The puzzles and progression are like you see in the Zelda games, but the combat is more viseral and reminds a little bit of God of War.

And I also found that it played better with a gamepad. Especially for the combat.

Read full topic

item.title: Darksiders
item.dc:creator: Dreadmoth
item.description:
I got it a few weeks ago - the PC version is quite good, didn’t encounter any significant bugs in the game and I actually found that the keyboard and mouse controls worked rather well for me.

Read full topic

item.title: Darksiders
item.dc:creator: Luciel
item.description:
Never have tried it on the PC but I could always plug in my 360 pad, so yeah I´m going for it, can´t go wrong for that price really

Read full topic

item.title: Darksiders
item.dc:creator: DiePoente
item.description:
If you have a gamepad, then better use it. Playing with keyboard is a pain in the ass. I played the whole game with keyboard…

Read full topic

item.title: Darksiders
item.dc:creator: Maxey
item.description:
It’s pretty good, I got it for PS3 tho, so I don’t know if the PC version is a decent port or not.
